CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 10, 1964, pg. 8 reads: "First Graduation Class - The first graduation class of Evelyn Meade's Beauty School, located at the corner of Homewood Ave. and Bennett St., was held recently in Homewood Carnegie Library Auditorium. Left to right, first row: Rosie Williams, Mary Jennings, Annabelle Banks, Mary Mack, Carolyn Ikard, Faye Deveraux, Bennie Thomas, Doric Jones, and Lillian Sumerville.  Second row: Evelyn Meade, supervisor; Mary Hart, Oscar Stevenson, Lessie Steiner, Shermell Burke, Marion Eason, Louise Johnson, Margaret Creighton, Frances Simmons, Theresa Kemp, Katherine Lowe, Clara Allen, Gloria Griffin, Harriet Watson, Judith Crews, Jessie Jones, Lenora Jackson, Lorraine Moody and Eugene Watson.  Third row: Gwendolyn Jones, Queenie Robertson, Joan Goodson, Esther Jones, Earnestine Ham, Rosetta Allen, Charlotte Whitelow, Jacqueline Taylor, Estelle Randolph, Irvin Spencer, Elaine Anderson, Gloria Grant, Diane Booker, Edith Tolbert, Nana Gee, Frances Wells and Margaret Canteen. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of three women and three men, including Evelyn Meade wearing dark suit and corsage and Rev. LeRoy Patrick wearing striped necktie, standing in Homewood Carnegie Library Auditorium with wooden paneling
